ComicInfo.Title: Ever Lands Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Iris flashes back on her life.
Theo is in the hands of the bad guy.
Malikai is fighting, but his friends disappear.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:24:47. [Issue ID 527058]
